title: M_TASK_PLAN
description: Root object of a materialised Task Plan structure, used in execution.

start_time.description: Nominal start time for the Task Plan as a whole. The timings of individual Tasks may be specified as offsets from this time, via `PLANNED_TIME._relative_offset_`.

definition.description: Root of run-time Task Plan Task structure.

pending_callbacks.description: Reference list of all wait conditions in the Task Plan, and current status.

principal_performer.description: Run-time principal performer - a person or other agent.

lifecycle_state.description: Lifecycle state of Task Plan, derived as a copy of the `_lifecycle_state()_` of the definition `TASK_GROUP`.
